result.title: Given array , find max sum
result.content:
Given array Array arr[i] with length of array = n >=2, change order of array elements so that sum given by following code is maximized ( index start from 1) where N<=15 and 1<=arr[i]<=100

    int sum=0;  
    for(int i=2;i<=N;i++){
    if (arr[i]-arr[i-1] >= 0){
       sum=sum + i*(arr[i]-arr[i-1]);
    }
    else{
       sum=sum + i*(arr[i-1]-arr[i]);   
    }
    }

I thought of greedy method , sorting the array then alternatively selecting max and min and placing them in second array from end . but it is wrong Please suggest correct efficient method
